com.camerontec.util.datamodel.message

Class UnpooledMessageFactory<T extends Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.datamodel.message.UnpooledMessageFactory<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - message type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageFactory<T>

    public class UnpooledMessageFactory<T extends Message>
extends Object
implements MessageFactory<T>
    Unpooled MessageFactory implementation which creates a new Message on invocation of newMessage().

    This implementation allows for initial capacity customization of root and nested field groups as well as fields.

    All fields and field groups created as a consequence of using messages obtained by using an instance of this class are also unpooled.

    See Also:
    MessageFactoryProperties, ReflectiveMessageFactory, UnpooledFieldAllocator, UnpooledMessageContextResources
